encoder.name: Decimal Encoder
encoder.author: Thomas Shaw
encoder.description: Takes ASCII strings and encodes each character into it's decimal representation.
encoder.solution: Convert the decimal (base 10) string into its ASCII value, character by character in sets of 3. Use an ascii table e.g. http://www.asciitable.com OR an online converter e.g. https://www.branah.com/ascii-converter
